headline: Hyundai Wants to Sell Bigger Trucks. Ford and GM Investors Should Be Aware.
summary: Ahead of its investor event in New York, Hyundai announced it plans to sell 5.55 million cars in 2030. The auto maker sold 4.14 million vehicles in 2024.
